name: BetterCamera
shortDescription: Just a little extension that makes the camera much better! :3.
description: - Camera Position: Change the camera position with 1 event instead of 2
- Lerp To Object: lerps the camera to and object with a given speed (Speed * Delta)

eventsFunctions.description: Will make the camera lerp to an object .
eventsFunctions.fullName: Lerp the camera to an object
eventsFunctions.name: LerpObject

eventsFunctions.description: Moves the camera to an position instantly.
eventsFunctions.name: CameraPosition

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Makes the camera move smoothly with some tweaks.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: PlatformerCameraPadding

parameters: lerp(CameraCenterY(Object.Layer()), Object.CenterY() - (((Object.Required::CurrentJumpSpeed() - Object.Required::CurrentFallSpeed()) / 100) * Divide), clamp(Speed * TimeDelta(), 0, 0.5))

eventsFunctions.description: the speed of camera of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: Speed

eventsFunctions.description: the procentage of padding of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: Padding

eventsFunctions.description: Check if padding for the camera X.
eventsFunctions.name: PaddingBool

eventsFunctions.description: Change padding boolean for the camera X.
eventsFunctions.name: SetPaddingBool

propertyDescriptors.label: Procentage of padding
propertyDescriptors.description: This only works if padding is enabled.
propertyDescriptors.name: Padding

propertyDescriptors.label: Padding for the camera X
propertyDescriptors.description: It basically goes like, if ur standing in the middle of the camera and u walk a lil left ur still pretty close to the middle so the camera shouldnt move.
propertyDescriptors.name: PaddingBool

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Makes the camera move smoothly to where your character is looking.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: PlatformerCameraDirection

parameters: lerp(CameraCenterY(Object.Layer()), Object.CenterY() - (((Object.Required::CurrentJumpSpeed() - Object.Required::CurrentFallSpeed()) / 100) * Divide), clamp(Speed * TimeDelta(), 0, 0.5))

eventsFunctions.description: the speed of camera of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: Speed

eventsFunctions.description: the offset X of the object.
eventsFunctions.name: Offset

propertyDescriptors.label: Look in direction
propertyDescriptors.description: Makes it so if ur character is facing left then the camera will move more to the left.
propertyDescriptors.name: OffsetBool

propertyDescriptors.label: Offset X
propertyDescriptors.description: This only works if Direction is enabled.
propertyDescriptors.name: Offset

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Makes the camera move smoothly with padding (Good for top down games).
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: PaddingCamera
